alert.note: Alert for Eastern Roosevelt; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 27 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Daniels, Dawson, Eastern Roosevelt, Garfield, McCone, Northern Phillips, Northern Valley, Petroleum, Prairie, Richland, Sheridan, Southwest Phillips, Western Roosevelt and Wibaux. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Shower and thunderstorm activity on top of the previous few days of rainfall may lead to flooding in areas where heavy rainfall is persistent. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Roosevelt; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips
